query:
SELECT g.id, g.nome, u.email 
FROM gestores g 
INNER JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
WHERE u.email LIKE '%mamorim%' OR g.nome LIKE '%Marco Amorim%';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT g.id, g.nome, u.email 
FROM gestores g 
INNER JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
WHERE u.email LIKE '%mamorim%' OR g.nome LIKE '%Marco Amorim%';
